p: Flavonoid chemical structures have been reported to have melanogenesis-stimulating actions [ 34]. Flavonoids including quercetin, kaempferol, rhamnetin, apigenin, luteolin, chrysin, genestein showed melanogenesis-promoting actions [ 34, 35, 36] but rutin, robinetin, myricetin, ipriflavone, epigalocatechin gallate (EGCg) and naringin did not [ 34].
